title: bard should be able to use michaels to get people out of his ult stasus.
body: I know it would be an odd inconsistency in what michaels does and it defies a stasus, but It would be a nice niche combo. This way ulting to save an ally will be more likely to get them out rather then just putting off the inevitable. Would be really nice if he could get allies out with his shrines giving them more function past lane phase actually. This could make the ability more useful as a way to save allies.

Ah, I see; sorry to intrude.

That sounds cool but I feel like competitive play would find a way to abuse that.

Bard has good natural mobility and even waveclear if you collect his chimes, this would give him a more reliable disengage where he could ult whoever is engaging onto 1 of his teammates and then immediately w the teammate in question.


Could also make for some weird engage synergy.


Basically it could add up to too many things that are on that checklist of things coordinated teams would want.



And we dont need ANOTHER champion to become trash tier because of competitive play :/ bard is already leaning on that edge.
how about with michaels though? It has a long cool down and is already an anti cc active... wouldn't be as abusable as w just for being less likely to be available at the time.
Sounds better but still afraid of the possible consequences, even situational stuff like tahm R to let teammate escape/ w movement speed towards enemies caused riot throw the nerf hammer.

I know riot doesn't typically do this but... they could just revert it if it became a serious problem in professional play. I just feel that bard being the play maker can have issues making the play in the jumbled mess that is team fights. Being able to use michaels like that would allow bard to produce turn arounds even harder then he already does with a well placed ult-redemtion-q. I can understand the concern but this isn't something bard would need to keep IF it turned out broken as hell. Other then providing a better escape for allies or giving them a set up I cant imagine what other situation and synergy would break the game and bullseye bard.

eh just thought of one... galio ult-bard ult, michaels galio- galio w taunt- bard q and galio E

the potential of that combo would be insane both setting up for an inescapable wambo following the galio ult and that cc, we are talking about easily 5-7 seconds of at least three enemies being disabled and they probably just wouldn't live that long anyway with the catalyst being the bard using michaels on the galio. Yeah okay this might be a bad idea.
